snippet.title: The Wardrobe: Even Better Edition - Nintendo Switch Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The award winning and critically acclaimed “The Wardrobe: Even Better Edition” developed by CINIC Games launches on the Nintendo Switch eShop On October 31st 2019.

A new enhanced edition with new achievements / Easter Eggs / hints and a remastered voice over will be available for 19.99$/€ or if your quick with a 50% discount until the 7th of November.

Purchase it now: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/the-wardrobe-even-better-edition-switch/

The Wardrobe is the ideal game for those who want to look for (un)healthy doses of humour and for all those super-nerdy people who love quotes and pop culture from the 80s to the present day.

Website: http://www.cinicgames.com
Press kit: https://mega.nz/#!P0JRkKaQ!_-QBDqcrsRwvuc4t_V2xDfi4pCV-w5YnJISL3qlpfBw

A point and click adventure with plums as crime weapons and skeletons that hate their players.

A look inside “The Wardrobe: Even Better Edition”

You control Skinny, a young boy who was accidentally killed by his best friend Ronald all because of a plum! For unknown reasons, Skinny is brought back to life, reduced to a skeletal form and forced to live in his executioner’s wardrobe, being in effect his skeleton in the closet.

It all happened five years ago, during a picnic arranged by Ronald and his best friend Skinny. Things were going well, until Ronald pulled out two very tiny plums from his basket, one for Skinny and one for him. Not knowing about his deadly allergy to plums, Skinny didn’t think twice about eating it, and immediately went into anaphylactic shock which caused his sudden death. Ronald ran off, terrified.

When he woke up, Skinny discovered that he had become a skeleton and been sentenced to live in Ronald’s bedroom wardrobe forever. Since then, Skinny has watched over Ronald constantly, without his knowledge… but now things are going to change! To save his best friend’s soul from eternal damnation, Skinny will be forced to reveal himself and make Ronald admit his 'crime'. Not a simple challenge at all!

- A protagonist overflowing with sarcasm, cynicism and breakthroughs of the fourth wall
- Full of nerdy culture pop quotes from the 80s to the present day
- Super vibes of classic “point & click"
- More than 40 hand-illustrated and digitally coloured locations
-Tons of clever puzzles and inventory objects to collect!
-Play as Skinny, a teen-skeleton with an impertinent attitude and a sparkling wit!

For further information, please contact: Francesco - press@cinicgames.com

About CINIC Games

CINIC Games is an independent studio born from an idea of Francesco Liotta, at the time a freelancer developer, founded later in 2015. The studio’s mission is to create PC and console games out of the box with a strong artistic and narrative imprint. The team in CINIC Games is entirely composed of professionals who continue to play video games, right because our titles are firstly designed to be games that we ourselves would like to play. CINIC Games escapes in part the classic corporate paradigm and prefers instead a more open and flexible structure, which allows all team members to work remotely without a real central office.
